_builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”About SLW” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”1.35em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

About SLW

SolarWind is engineering an all new way to finance solar projects using blockchain technology and cryptocurrency. We’re building a high yielding lending and borrowing ecosystem that is powered by SolarWind Token – the currency of pioneers. Pioneers that are choosing to push the world forward into an abundant and bright future. 


The full process of financing a project from start to finish is made possible through our mobile app. We have a dedicated project fund wallet that will be used to pay solar installers. Every new installer will be required to create a wallet and have it listed with their company name on our website. The funds will be paid to the installer according to the project milestones. Upon project completion, the customer will be able to make payments directly into the liquidity pool with a credit or debit card via our mobile app.


Bitcoin and crypto mining facilities will also be able to quickly and easily go solar with SolarWind! This will reduce or even eliminate their monthly electric expense, making them more profitable, competitive, and resilient in market downturns. Bitcoin miners will be able to pay in BTC, which will also back the value of $SLW. 


We also realize the importance of giving back to communities around the world. We plan to establish our own nonprofit, Positive Energy. 5% of the funds deployed to the installers will be allocated to a charity wallet to fulfill missions around the world – voted on by the community. Such missions will consist of a wide variety of topics such as energy, health, hunger, homelessness, and more.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Why SLW row” module_class=”holders-slw-row-v2″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1200px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”150px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Why Solar Wind” module_class=”why-slw-text” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”1.35em” width=”90%” max_width=”850px” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Why SolarWind?

As the world transitions to renewable energy, homeowners, businesses, and governments are needing to transition into using solar energy. Millions of drivers are expected to switch to electric vehicles, and Bitcoin miners are seeking cleaner energy sources. This is a recipe for exponential growth in the solar industry – which only has a market cap in the hundred billions, compared to the multi-trillion dollar energy sector. 

There have been many programs to help incentivize homeowners and businesses; however, it is difficult for many people to pay for an installation in cash or even to find financing to fund a solar installation on their home or business. 

SolarWind is the solution. This token provides a brand-new way for people to invest into the solar industry, gives customers and installers access to easy financing, accelerates Bitcoin’s transition to clean and renewable energy, and helps governments with their goals to reduce carbon emissions.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Holders: #1″ module_class=”holders-slw-row-v2″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1200px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”150px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text: Holders #1″ module_class=”holders-slw-text-v2″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”700px” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Holders have the opportunity to grow with the token in four different ways.

#1

The 5% redistribution allows holders to accumulate more tokens the longer they hold from every single transaction of the token.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://solarwindtoken.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/1-whitepapergraphics-Solution1a.png” title_text=”whitepapergraphics-Solution1a” admin_label=”IMG: Holders #1″ module_class=”holders-slw-img-v2″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Holders: #2″ module_class=”holders-slw-row-v2″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1200px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”150px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://solarwindtoken.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/whitepapergraphics-Solution2a.png” title_text=”whitepapergraphics-Solution2a” disabled_on=”on|off|off” admin_label=”IMG: Holders #2″ module_class=”holders-slw-img-v2″ _builder_version=”4.10.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text: Holders #2″ module_class=”holders-slw-text-v2″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”700px” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

#2

The liquidity pool will be increasing after project completion because as customers complete their payments, more money will be put back into the pool than was originally used. This adds a traditional form of investing because holders can indirectly earn interest through the liquidity pool.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://solarwindtoken.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/whitepapergraphics-Solution2a.png” title_text=”whitepapergraphics-Solution2a” disabled_on=”off|on|on” admin_label=”IMG: Holders #2″ module_class=”holders-slw-img-v2″ _builder_version=”4.10.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Holders: #3″ module_class=”holders-slw-row-v2″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1200px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”150px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text: Holders #3″ module_class=”holders-slw-text-v2″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”700px” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

#3

Renewable energy as a whole still plays such a small role in the overall energy sector. This token allows holders to partake in the exponential growth that is to come in the renewable industry.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://solarwindtoken.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/whitepapergraphics-Solution3a.png” title_text=”whitepapergraphics-Solution3a” admin_label=”IMG: Holders #3″ module_class=”holders-slw-img-v2″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Holders: #4″ module_class=”holders-slw-row-v2″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”1200px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”150px||210px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://solarwindtoken.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/whitepapergraphics-Solution4a.png” title_text=”whitepapergraphics-Solution4a” admin_label=”IMG: Holders #4″ module_class=”holders-slw-img-v2″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text: Holders #4″ module_class=”holders-slw-text-v2″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” width=”90%” max_width=”700px” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

#4

Striving to solve Bitcoin’s energy dependence on nonrenewable resources will allow not only Bitcoin to grow in value, but the entire cryptocurrency market.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”Process Item Row 1a” module_class=”progress-row” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://solarwindtoken.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/slw-process_01-supply.png” title_text=”slw-process_01-supply” admin_label=”img: supply” module_class=”process-img” _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”The Supply” module_class=”process-text” _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Supply

We are starting with 5% of the total supply in the early stages of the coin to fund our first project. Afterwards, 2.5% of all transactions will be used to fund new projects.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#111111″ custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://solarwindtoken.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/slw-process_02-partnership.png” title_text=”slw-process_02-partnership” admin_label=”img: partnerships” module_class=”process-img” _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”100ms” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Partnerships” module_class=”process-text” _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Partnerships

We are partnering with different solar companies to find qualified customers that need financing.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://solarwindtoken.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/slw-process_03-approval.png” title_text=”slw-process_03-approval” admin_label=”img: approval” module_class=”process-img” _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”200ms” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Approval” module_class=”process-text” _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Approval

Once we determine a qualified project, a portion of the dedicated project fund will be used to pay for the installation.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”Process Item Row 1b” module_class=”progress-row” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||210px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#111111″ custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://solarwindtoken.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/slw-process_04-allocation.png” title_text=”slw-process_04-allocation” admin_label=”img: allocation” module_class=”process-img” _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”300ms” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Allocation” module_class=”process-text” _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Allocation

5% of the financed cost to the installer will be allocated to a Positive Energy wallet, and those funds will either be donated with a community vote or used for in house charity events.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://solarwindtoken.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/slw-process_05-repayment.png” title_text=”slw-process_05-repayment” admin_label=”img: repayment” module_class=”process-img” _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”400ms” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Repayment” module_class=”process-text” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Repayment

When the project is complete, the customer will pay back the financed amount with interest through our app, so the liquidity that was used initially will be replenished with a higher dollar amount.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#111111″ custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://solarwindtoken.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/slw-process_06-growth.png” title_text=”slw-process_06-growth” admin_label=”img: growth” module_class=”process-img” _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”500ms” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Growth” module_class=”process-text” _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Growth

As the coin grows, we will have community votes to fund large projects that will generate liquidity for many years into the future, like utility scale solar installations.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Tokenomics Row” module_id=”tokenomics” module_class=”tokenomics-row” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”1200px” custom_padding=”||60px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Tokenomics” module_class=”tokenomics-row-below” _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”20px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Tokenomics

Liquidity used in project fund will be replenished over time with more put back in the pool than was used.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ admin_label=”Tokenomics V2″ module_class=”tokenomics-v2″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||240px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_number_counter title=”Total Supply” number=”1,000,000,000″ percent_sign=”off” module_class=”tokenomics-counter-one tokenomics-counter” _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_number_counter][et_pb_number_counter title=”Burned” number=”500,000,000″ percent_sign=”off” module_class=”tokenomics-counter-two tokenomics-counter” _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_number_counter][et_pb_number_counter title=”of all transactions go to a dedicated project fund. Positive Energy

Our nonprofit will be dedicated to serving communities and solving their problems. The nonprofit will do mission trips around the world to provide free solar installations to areas with an unstable electric grid, feeding the hungry, housing the homeless, and more.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Roadmap Section” module_id=”roadmap” module_class=”roadmap-section” _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”90px||150px||false|false” bottom_divider_height=”75px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Roadmap Row” module_class=”roadmap-row” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”740px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title: Roadmap” module_class=”roadmap-title-v2″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Roadmap

FAQs

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_toggle title=”What is the contract address?” open_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” closed_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” icon_color=”#000000″ use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”25px” admin_label=”Toggle: What is the Contract Address?” module_class=”faq-toggle-item” _builder_version=”4.10.3″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

0x0ba59be045f570a2be774e319a210a0087b4f35b
View BscScan

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Is SLW safe?” open_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” closed_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” icon_color=”#000000″ use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”25px” admin_label=”Toggle: Is SLW safe?” module_class=”faq-toggle-item” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

We have locked the liquidity until May 31, 2023, we have a rolling lock on 15% of the token supply, and we are in the process of receiving our TechRate audit (completed).

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”What makes SLW unique from other tokens?” open_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” closed_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” icon_color=”#000000″ use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”25px” admin_label=”Toggle: What makes SLW unique from other tokens?” module_class=”faq-toggle-item” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

We’ve engineered an entirely new way to invest! Gone are the days of buying something based on speculation, hoping it will go up in the future. SolarWind assets are building and generating value in the real world. Our token is unique because we are the first to market with this concept in the solar industry. We are also addressing Bitcoin’s energy issues by integrating miners into our ecosystem and providing them with an abundant source of clean energy.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Is the LP locked?” open_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” closed_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” icon_color=”#000000″ use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”25px” admin_label=”Toggle: Is the LP locked?” module_class=”faq-toggle-item” _builder_version=”4.9.5″ _module_preset=”default” body_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]
